DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm invasive adenocarcinoma , squamous cell carcinoma , adenosquamous cell carcinoma cervix Stage IIB , III , IVA disease Eligible evaluable GOG0191 Pre and/or posttreatment serum specimens available proteomic analysis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Patient give consent allow specimen ( ) use future cancer research PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
